attributes.action: only pay child benefit for the first child only
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Idiots giving birth to Idiots people who have NEVER WORKED in their lives deciding to have endless amounts of kids at the tax payers expense, people who can't afford to look after kids shouldn't expect the tax payer to foot the bill, it creates a benefit sponging society, people need to be responsible for children and not see them as a easy pay day.

reasons: Language which is offensive, intemperate, or provocative
